title: Fragmentary Greek inscription (funerary?)
support: Neither the material nor the form of this inscription is recorded.

handNote.lettering: Since the text is only recorded in the second-hand transcription by Torremuzza, nothing reliable can be said about the letter-forms.

date._: A date in the period 4th — 1st century BCE seems most likely, but it is impossible to be certain in the absence of further information

provenanceFound._: Reported at second-hand by Torremuzza (1769), who was sent the text by Nicolaus Capretti.
